newsitem.title: PERU: Peru rebels release 10th hostage of day.
newsitem.headline: Peru rebels release 10th hostage of day.

text.p: Peruvian guerrillas, holding up to 484 hostages at the Japanese ambassador's residence, late on Wednesday released an elderly man of unknown nationality named Jose Luis del Cossio, officials and witnesses said.

The man, released at 9:30 p.m. EST (0230 GMT), was led from the compound by Michel Minning, a Red Cross representative. Minning had entered the residency earlier and helped carry food and water and an X-ray machine to the rebels.
